name: Aave
description: A decentralized lending platform enabling users to earn interest or borrow assets with flexible rates.

apy.explanation: The 7.2% APY represents your annual earnings from lending assets on Aave. It's derived from interest paid by borrowers, fluctuating based on market demand across all supported networks.

smartContractRisk.description: Low risk; extensively audited and battle-tested, with continued protocol improvements enhancing security.

impermanentLoss.description: Minimal risk; Aave focuses on lending, not AMM pools, so impermanent loss is not a significant concern.

marketRisk.description: Moderate risk; volatile markets can affect collateral values and borrowing stability, though multiple safeguards exist.

liquidationRisk.description: Moderate risk; borrowers face liquidation if collateral drops, mitigated by conservative loan-to-value ratios.

tokenomicDesignRisk.description: Low risk; AAVE's governance and staking model has proven robust, with minimal centralization concerns.

name: Yearn Finance
description: Automates yield farming by maximizing returns through optimized vaults across DeFi.

apy.explanation: The 10.3% APY is your annual return from Yearn vaults, achieved by automatically shifting your assets between DeFi protocols to maximize yield based on market conditions.

smartContractRisk.description: Moderate risk; complex strategies are regularly audited, but the sophistication of vault mechanisms introduces some risk.

impermanentLoss.description: Moderate risk; some vaults interact with AMM pools, potentially exposing users to impermanent loss.

marketRisk.description: High risk; vault returns depend heavily on volatile DeFi market conditions and yield opportunities.

liquidationRisk.description: Low risk; Yearn vaults typically don't involve direct borrowing, reducing liquidation exposure.

tokenomicDesignRisk.description: Moderate risk; YFI's limited supply creates scarcity value, but governance concentration remains a consideration.

name: Curve Finance
description: A DEX designed for efficient stablecoin trading and yield generation.

apy.explanation: The 5.8% APY comes from providing liquidity to Curve pools. It combines trading fees and CRV rewards, with potential boosts for users who lock CRV tokens for voting power.

smartContractRisk.description: Low risk; heavily audited and stable code, though past incidents highlight the need for ongoing vigilance.

impermanentLoss.description: Low risk; stablecoin focus minimizes impermanent loss, except during rare significant depeg events.

marketRisk.description: Moderate risk; stablecoin depegging can disrupt pool stability and affect returns.

liquidationRisk.description: Minimal risk; Curve doesn't involve direct lending, so liquidation isn't a primary concern.

tokenomicDesignRisk.description: Moderate risk; veCRV locking mechanism creates some governance concentration concerns.

name: Uniswap
description: A leading AMM-based DEX providing yield via liquidity pools.

apy.explanation: The 5.3% APY represents your yearly earnings from providing liquidity on Uniswap. This return comes primarily from trading fees collected when users swap tokens through your liquidity pools.

smartContractRisk.description: Low risk; extensively audited and battle-tested contracts with widespread adoption and ongoing security improvements.

impermanentLoss.description: High risk; volatile trading pairs can lead to significant impermanent loss for liquidity providers.

marketRisk.description: Moderate risk; trading volume fluctuations and market sentiment directly impact fee generation.

liquidationRisk.description: Minimal risk; Uniswap doesn't involve direct lending or liquidation mechanisms.

tokenomicDesignRisk.description: Low risk; UNI has a well-established governance system with broad token distribution.

name: SushiSwap
description: A community-driven DEX with yield farming incentives and cross-chain support.

apy.explanation: The 6.8% APY represents your earnings from SushiSwap liquidity provision. This return combines trading fees and SUSHI rewards, which vary by pool and can be boosted by staking SUSHI.

smartContractRisk.description: Moderate risk; while audited regularly, SushiSwap's rapid development cycle and frequent upgrades introduce some risk.

impermanentLoss.description: High risk; volatile trading pairs can lead to significant impermanent loss for liquidity providers.

marketRisk.description: Moderate risk; trading volume fluctuations directly impact fee generation and SUSHI rewards.

liquidationRisk.description: Minimal risk; SushiSwap's primary functions don't involve direct lending or liquidation mechanisms.

tokenomicDesignRisk.description: Moderate risk; SUSHI tokenomics have evolved since launch, with ongoing adjustments to emission schedules.
